metadata.title: New Churchwarden "Dragon" Extralong Tobacco Pipe 25'' Handcrafted Pear Root Handcrafted
features: Exclusive Gift For Smokers EXTRALONG "DRAGON" PIPE!
description: Hello and Welcome to Fashion Pipes Shop, Your one stop shop for all your smoking needs. We have a vast range of Smoking Pipes, Cigarette Holders and all the relevant products to make your smoking experience ever more enjoyable. Pipes, Tobacco Pouches, Cigarette Holders etc. are all displayed to profusion within our store, with every makers name one can think of. If in the unlikely event you can't find what your after please ask we are here to help. Our products are made by professional master of Ukraine with the author's sign Using natural high quality materials For the manufacture of pipe was used pear wood, aged in natural drying for at least 2 years. Unique handmade carved pipe with a jeweler's precision. Design worthy of true professionals ! Shading pipes made of quality Italian stained The final polishing of products made with refined carnauba wax Pipe mouthpieces are made of ebonite by filter 9mm, cooler or forward flow BRAND NEW NEVER USED !!! NO falsification - only Real Quality Measurements & Other Details: Length: 25'' / 630 mm We guarantee you complete satisfaction with all ours high quality products ++++++ If you have any further question, please feel free to contact us ! MAKE YOUR CHOICE WITH FASHION PIPES ! ! !
